pages.title: Skin Rack
pages.text: The skin rack is used to obtain leather from animal skins.
Using the skin rack is really simple and requires a couple of other resources. Which are: $(li)A wet rag or sponge$(li)Salt

pages.title: How to use
pages.text: To convert skins into leather you simply need to:$(br)$(br)1. Place a compatible skin onto the skin rack.$(li)2. Wet the skin with either a wet sponge or a wet rag.$(li)3. Apply salt to the wet skin by right clicking whilst holding salt.$(li)4. Wait 60 seconds and the skin will cure into leather.
